11321.content: Are you going to worship a guy or a gal?
11321.title: Moth Feet

113212.content:
You wake up in what appears to be a massive terrarium, gigantic bowls for food in water within walking distance of you. The terrarium is in a colossal room, black and purple being the dominant colors. You try to shake yourself out of this, as it is surely some sort of dream, but you are unsuccessful. As you truly begin to get a grasp of the situation, you hear the huge door to the room open, an anthropomorphic moth walking inside.

You can tell that they are a young woman from how their body is shaped. She appears to be rather fluffy, her "fur" a light gray that matched her dark clothes. She wore a black hoodie, a purple t-shirt, black sweatpants, and black clogs. She sets her backpack on her bed and begins going through it. As she does so, you realize that she is at least ten times as tall as you, maybe bigger. She soon finished with taking her items out of the massive pack, and turned around to see you in the terrarium.

"Hey there lil' guy! Finally awake?" she says with a giggle. "You know why you're here, right?"

Too frightened by the entire situation to respond, you merely shake your head.

"Well, you're my new foot toy! Doesn't that sound great?"

You shake your head once more.

"Oh, that's too bad. It took a lot of searching to find a little foot pet, and I don't want to have to return you. Who knows how cruel some of the other buyers would be? Are you sure that you wouldn't mind playing with them for just a little bit?"

After she says this, she walks over to her bed and sits down. She slips her feet out of her humongous clogs and shows off her soles while curling and uncurling her toes. Although you were already small, her feet seemed big for her size. A little on the meaty side with black nail polish, her feet actually looked like she took good care of them.

"Seriously, just a little massaging and worshipping, along with whatever else you want," she says with a wink.
113212.title: The Female Moth's Feet

info.brief_description: A story all about feet. Wheter it's anthro or not.
info.description:
This story is all about feet. You are an teenager (a human) and have been shrunk down to only a few inches and must now worship feet of an Anthro.

-Any anthro is allowed.
-No other humans but yourself.
-You can't shirnk or grow. You are just simply a few inches tall that's it.
-The Anthro's can also vore you.
-Any type of vore is allowed, but try to keep it focused on the feet.
-You can have the human get killed.
-Squishing is allowed.
-You can have the anthros do really basty stuff to the human. Wheter it's usuing them as a sex toy, rubbing them on their cock etc.
-Good long additions please.
-GP's will be given for lengthy addtions
-And please try and use proper grammar.

Have fun and make sure you clean those feet!
